roleset.name: put in a box to store
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on box-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls pocket-9.10

example.name: all args
example.text: His boxing the old photos in milk crates didn't protect them from the weather.

roleset.name: forming an enclosure
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on box-v.02. No VNcls.

example.name: arg1
example.text: A very ancient pueblo on a rocky bluff 3 m. n. e. of Co- chiti, in the so-called Caja del Rio, so named from the "boxing" of the canyon of the Rio Grande here, in Sandoval co., N. Mex.
example.arg: of the canyon of the Rio Grande

roleset.name: fighting, boxing style
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, box-v.03. Corresponds to VNcls meet-36.3-2.

example.name: both args
example.text: Jon Jones ready to show his boxing against Ryan Bader on Feb. 5
